suggestions.name: Protein-Packed Oatmeal with Eggs
suggestions.description: A savory breakfast bowl combining creamy oats with scrambled eggs for maximum protein.
instructions: Cook oats with milk according to package instructions (about 3-4 minutes).
In a separate pan, scramble the eggs with spinach.
Pour the cooked oats into a bowl, top with scrambled eggs.
Sprinkle with cheese and season with salt and pepper.

suggestions.name: Egg White Oatmeal Protein Bowl
suggestions.description: A lower-fat, high-protein breakfast combining egg whites with oatmeal for a creamy texture.
instructions: Cook oats with water for about 2 minutes until partially done.
Whisk egg whites and add to the oatmeal, stirring constantly to prevent clumping.
Cook for another 2-3 minutes until creamy and fully cooked.
Slice banana and add on top.
Sprinkle with cinnamon and add vanilla extract.

suggestions.name: Oat and Egg Breakfast Muffins
suggestions.description: Portable, protein-rich breakfast muffins combining eggs and oats that can be made ahead.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a muffin tin.
Dice bell pepper into small pieces.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Stir in oats, diced bell pepper, and most of the cheese.
Pour mixture into muffin cups, filling each about 3/4 full.
Bake for 18-20 minutes until set and golden on top.
